channel.title: habits on Arjun Uvacha
channel.description: Recent content in habits on Arjun Uvacha

item.title: Hooked
item.description: Hooked is one of those books which I would recommend to every aspiring Product Manager. In fact, anyone who is even sparsely connected with human psychology or behaviour should read this. It is a short, quick read and insightful with some clever real-world examples. While reading the book, I had collated some important and wow moments in my notepad. I wanted to share them with others and thus this article. Please note that this in no way is the gist of the book!

item.title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
item.description: Many of us either in the school, or at work, or in any of the great speeches would have heard of the difference between effectiveness and efficiency. Give it a thought, pause for a minute and think about what effectiveness is and what efficiency is? Think of your own daily activitiesâ€¦ can you name at least one activity in which you are very effective and one activity in which you are very efficient?
